Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the definition of the term veteran and the membership of the veterans’ advisory board

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to offering discharge upgrade assistance and extending city veteran benefits to service members who were discharged because of their LGBTQ status

Items.MatterName: Offering discharge upgrade assistance and extending city veteran benefits to service members who were discharged because of their LGBTQ status.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Dromm and Louis
